controls.caption: Check only 3 channels (RGB)
controls.name: checkOnlyRGBChannels
controls.description:
If set and the number of matrix channels > 3, this function checks only first 3 channels (usually RGB).
If cleared, it checks all channels, regardless on their amount (for example, checks Î±-channel in RGBA image).

controls.caption: Invert result
controls.name: invert
controls.description: If set, the result binary matrix will be inverted. In other words, it will contain bit 1 for pixels, for which all channels (or all first 3 channels) in the source matrix are zero, and bit 0 for all non-zero pixels.
